item.title: About
item.author: Daniel
item.description: Hi there, I’m Daniel ðŸ‘‹ I’m an engineer located in Toronto, Canada and I work specifically in the field of platform engineering and cloud. I always loved working with electronics and tweaking my PC for optimal performance as a hobby and this led me to a career focusing on networking, infrastructure and development. Site I created this page is to share my work, personal learning, interests and random facts. This page is static website hosted on Github pages, I found it is sufficient for my current use case.
